title: Button Swing Animation
description: In this lab, we will explore CSS programming by learning how to create and modify stylesheets to control the appearance of web pages. You will gain hands-on experience with various CSS properties and selectors to create visually appealing and responsive designs. By the end of the lab, you will have a solid understanding of CSS and be able to apply your knowledge to create professional-looking websites.
